section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content1: Welcome to the Quotation System ("the System"). By using this System, you agree to comply with the following terms of service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the System.
section1.content2: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Any modifications will be posted on this page and will take effect immediately upon posting. Continued use of the System constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.content: The System provides the following features and services:

list.item4: Multi-currency support and exchange rate management

section3.title: 3. User Responsibilities
section3.content: As a user of the System, you agree to:

list.item1: Provide accurate and complete registration information and keep it updated
list.item2: Protect the security of your account and password, and not share with others
list.item3: Be responsible for all activities under your account
list.item4: Not use the System for any illegal or unauthorized activities

section4.title: 4. Data and Privacy
section4.content: We value your privacy and commit to:

list.item1: Use your data solely for providing services and improving user experience
list.item2: Take appropriate security measures to protect your data
list.item3: Not sell or share your personal data with third parties without your consent

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property Rights
section5.content: The System and all its content (including but not limited to software, design, text, graphics) are owned by us or our licensors. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or otherwise use this content without written authorization.

section6.title: 6. Service Changes and Termination
section6.content: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate the System or any part of it at any time without notice. We are not liable for any losses resulting from any modification, suspension, or termination of services.

section7.title: 7. Disclaimer
section7.content: The System is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free. To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from use or inability to use the System.

section8.title: 8. Contact Information
section8.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us via email at service@quote24.cc.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: The Quotation System ("the System") is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data. By using this System, you agree to the terms of this policy.

section1.title: 1. Data Collection
section1.content: We collect the following types of data:

list.item2: Third-party login information: basic profile data when signing in via Google
list.item3: Business data: customer information, quotation content, product/service data
list.item4: Usage records: IP address, browser type, visit history, operation logs

section2.title: 2. Data Usage
section2.content: The data we collect is used for the following purposes:

list.item3: System notifications and important update alerts

section3.title: 3. User Rights
section3.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

list.item1: Access: You can request to view the personal data we hold about you at any time
list.item2: Correction: You can request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
list.item3: Deletion: You can request deletion of your account and related data, but you will no longer be able to use the service after deletion

section4.title: 4. Security Measures
section4.content: We take the following measures to protect your data:

section5.title: 5. Third-Party Services
section5.content: This System uses the following third-party service providers:

list.item1: Supabase: User authentication and partial data storage
list.item2: Cloudflare: Website hosting, CDN, and database services

section6.content: We use cookies to provide the following functions:

section7.content: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any significant changes will be announced on this page. Continued use of this System constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.
